subject: Order #SSN4523
description_text:
Wondering if you have sent the adapter for the plus x pedals please 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Leon Jones,      We apologize for the delayed response. We have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047243501028
